fields.description:
I noticed in the scope of one of our add-on's on updating attachments that notifications were sent, also in combination if the attachment object (new attachment object) was marked as minor update. This was not the case in previous versions of Confluence (5.5 and 5.6). 

The behavior is reproducible using Confluence directly (default UI) and also using the API based on a integration test.

Best regards
Sven
fields.summary: Behavior of the attachment API regarding setMinorEdit does not work anymore

fields.description:
h2. How to Replicate:
# Create a new page
# Add an attachment of any type that will be converted/thumbnailed - e.g. PDF, DOC, PPT, etc.
# Save before the conversion is complete

h2. What Happens:
System Error page returned with the following stack trace:
{code}
Cause

com.atlassian.confluence.pages.persistence.dao.filesystem.AttachmentDataFileSystemException: Unable to move attachment (Attachment: Heading1.docx v.1 (557131) admin) from [C:\confluence\2.Test Sites\DATA\confluence_5.7\attachments\ver003\nonspaced\130\57\557130\557131] to [C:\confluence\2.Test Sites\DATA\confluence_5.7\attachments\ver003\185\36\786435\132\57\557132\557131] - check folder permissions.
    at com.atlassian.confluence.pages.persistence.dao.filesystem.HierarchicalMultiStreamAttachmentDataFileSystem.moveAttachment(HierarchicalMultiStreamAttachmentDataFileSystem.java:87)

caused by: java.io.IOException
    at com.atlassian.confluence.util.io.ConfluenceFileUtils.moveDir(ConfluenceFileUtils.java:74)
{code}

h2. Affected Environment:
# Confluence 5.7+ on Windows
# Use filesystem attachment storage
# Attaching any type of files that need to be converted - e.g. PDF, DOC, PPT, etc.

h2. Workaround:
Create a page first, and edit them later - this prevents the attachment from being attached to the draft and so it does not need to be moved.

h2. More information, watch screencast attached
fields.summary: Cannot save new pages with attachments that are still being converted on Windows
Allow page tree to limit the tree based on alphabet

Sincerly,

fields.description:
*Stacktrace:*
{code}2015-02-03 14:52:00,123 WARN [http-bio-8080-exec-2] [internal.integration.jira.DefaultJiraService] communicateWithJira Problem communicating with JIRA
 -- url: /confluence/rest/jira-integration/1.0/servers/c823ccbc-bcca-3d5d-9169-3f12fb15e747/projects | userName: admin | referer: http://localhost:8080/confluence/pages/createpage.action?spaceKey=ds&fromPageId=589832
com.atlassian.sal.api.net.ResponseException: java.net.SocketTimeoutException: Read timed out
	at com.atlassian.sal.core.net.HttpClientRequest.executeAndReturn(HttpClientRequest.java:376)
	at com.atlassian.plugins.rest.module.jersey.JerseyRequest.executeAndReturn(JerseyRequest.java:161)
	at com.atlassian.applinks.core.auth.ApplicationLinkRequestAdaptor.execute(ApplicationLinkRequestAdaptor.java:84)
	at com.atlassian.applinks.core.auth.oauth.ThreeLeggedOAuthRequest.execute(ThreeLeggedOAuthRequest.java:54)
	at com.atlassian.internal.integration.jira.DefaultJiraService$5.apply(DefaultJiraService.java:451)
	at com.atlassian.internal.integration.jira.DefaultJiraService$5.apply(DefaultJiraService.java:445)
	at com.atlassian.internal.integration.jira.DefaultJiraService.communicateWithJira(DefaultJiraService.java:702)
	at com.atlassian.internal.integration.jira.DefaultJiraService.getProjectsAsJson(DefaultJiraService.java:445)
	at com.atlassian.internal.integration.jira.rest.JiraServerResource.getProjectsMeta(JiraServerResource.java:43)
	at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method)
	at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(NativeMethodAccessorImpl.java:57)
	at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:43)
	at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:606)
{code}

*Steps to Reproduce:*
# Start up JIRA from source in debug mode. 
# Start up Confluence, and create an application link between the two instances
# Set the Socket Timeout in General Configuration to, for example, 20000 (20 seconds)
# Create a project and issue in JIRA
# Set a breakpoint in JIRA anywhere that's convenient and hit the breakpoint
# Create a new page in Confluence and open up the network tab of your Browser
# Create a JIRA Issues Macro in Confluence and search for the new project. Looking in the network tab of the browser's inspector, you'll see the following URL timing out after 10 seconds:
{code}http://localhost:8090/jira/rest/api/2/issue/createmeta?projects.issuetypes{code}
(Even after applying the workaround from https://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONF-36316)

If you apply the {{plugin.jira-integration.remote.timeout.socket}} system property (which is denoted in milliseconds), the timeout remains at 10 seconds (10000ms), as the {{ConfluenceJiraSettings}} class doesn't provide a useful implementation of {{getProperty()}}
fields.summary: plugin.jira-integration.remote.timeout.socket is ignored, so some calls to JIRA use an unconfigurable 10 second timeout
Too many single JIRA Issue macros in a Confluence page, can cause the page to load extremely slow

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-36332].
  {panel}

When editing a Confluence page on Atlassian Cloud, images no longer correctly display the properties > effects that have been selected.

Steps to reproduce:
Create confluence page
Attach an image
Select the image in the editor window
Click the image and select properties
Apply any type of effect to the image
Save the page

No image effect is rendered. 

Note also that the various effects do not display properly in the properties lightbox.
fields.summary: Confluence Image effects do not render
Read-only access should disable the like button, as this is an action

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-36322].
  {panel}

To Reproduce:
# Create a page using any blueprint (Retrospective, Product Requirements, Troubleshooting, Meeting Notes, etc.)
# Before saving, click Location and change the space and parent page
# When you save the page an error appears:
The following error(s) occurred:
The parent page specified does not exist. It may have been renamed or deleted since you started editing.

Nothing is written to the atlassian-confluence.log when this occurs.

Tested on Confluence 5.4.3, 5.4.4, 5.6.5 and on a Cloud instance.
fields.summary: Error when moving a page created from a blueprint

fields.description:
The page ordering in Confluence does a great job for alphabetical ordering with the exception of when there is a number in the title. For example, in my glossary, I can have on page titled DESC100 and another page titled DESC56.

It should list the pages in this order:

DESC100
DESC56

Instead, it lists the pages in this order:

DESC56
DESC100

1 comes before 5 just as A comes before E. The issue appears several times in my glossary. The kicker is that I would prefer to use the built-in alphabetical order functionality so that other glossary items do not get out of order. There are about 1500 items in my largest glossary, filed by letter, so it would be handy to keep things in order. 

I hope this is a quick algorithm tweak for your developers. I would not be surprised if others are having this issue.
fields.summary: Page Ordering Does Numbers Backwards in Confluence

fields.description:
When I use the JIRA filter macro, and I want to include the entire table of results, I see about 464 results on the page (perfect, all results are shown that match the query).

However, when I try to sort the table by a column by clicking on the column name, I get this error at the bottom of the table:

There was a problem rendering this section: timeout

I also cannot rearrange the columns in the edit mode of the macro.  I have to delete the columns and add the n in the order I want.  It would be nice to arrange them with drag/drop.

Using Confluence 5.5.3 on google chrome
fields.summary: JIRA Query does not allow sorting by column name
Make Confluence External Directory sync configurable to sync at a specific time

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-36318].
  {panel}

When you export a space to XML and use the "Custom Export" option, then content properties of pages that are not exported (due to restrictions) will get exported.

When you import such an export file you will end up with entries in the os_propertyentry table that have no link to a corresponding page. These entries are unreachable from now on and will not get deleted when you delete the space.
Consequentially every further import of the space will fail with a duplicate key exception.   

{code}
Import failed. Check your server logs for more information. com.atlassian.confluence.importexport.ImportExportException: Unable to complete import: could not insert: [bucket.user.propertyset.BucketPropertySetItem#BucketPropertySetItem[entityId=2129925,entityName=confluence_ContentEntityObject,key=com.k15t.scroll.versions.scroll-page-title,type=6,boolean=false,string=,text=Restricted,int=0,double=0.0,long=0,date=]]
{code}

h2. Steps to reproduce
1. Create a space
2. As user A (with 'restrict pages' permission) create a new page and use a plugin that uses content properties to store stuff (e.g. create a task list)
3. As user A restrict view and edit to user A
4. As user B (e.g. spaceadmin) export the space to XML with "Custom Export"
5. You can find the content properties in the entities.xml, but no corresponding page object
6. Delete the space
7. Import the space export
8. Delete the space. You will still find the content properties in the os_propertyentry table.
9. Import the space again and get the error from above.
fields.summary: Export custom XML exports content properties (os_propertyentry) for pages that are not included

fields.description:
If JIRA takes more than the default timeout in SAL (10 seconds) then anything that uses the application link, such as the JIRA Issues Macro or the highlighting panel, will fail. 

*Symptoms:*
 The following appears in atlassian-confluence.log:

{code}java.net.SocketTimeoutException: Read timed out
	at java.net.SocketInputStream.socketRead0(Native Method)
	at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(SocketInputStream.java:152)
	at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(SocketInputStream.java:122)
	at sun.security.ssl.InputRecord.readFully(InputRecord.java:442)
	at sun.security.ssl.InputRecord.read(InputRecord.java:480)
	at sun.security.ssl.SSLSocketImpl.readRecord(SSLSocketImpl.java:927)
	at sun.security.ssl.SSLSocketImpl.readDataRecord(SSLSocketImpl.java:884)
	at sun.security.ssl.AppInputStream.read(AppInputStream.java:102)
	at java.io.BufferedInputStream.fill(BufferedInputStream.java:235)
	at java.io.BufferedInputStream.read(BufferedInputStream.java:254)
	at org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpParser.readRawLine(HttpParser.java:78)
	at org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpParser.readLine(HttpParser.java:106)
	at org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpConnection.readLine(HttpConnection.java:1116)
	at org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpMethodBase.readStatusLine(HttpMethodBase.java:1973)
	at org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpMethodBase.readResponse(HttpMethodBase.java:1735)
	at org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpMethodBase.execute(HttpMethodBase.java:1098)
	at org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpMethodDirector.executeWithRetry(HttpMethodDirector.java:398)
	at org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpMethodDirector.executeMethod(HttpMethodDirector.java:171)
	at org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpClient.executeMethod(HttpClient.java:397)
	at org.apache.commons.httpclient.HttpClient.executeMethod(HttpClient.java:323)
	at com.atlassian.confluence.util.http.httpclient.HttpClientHttpRetrievalService.get(HttpClientHttpRetrievalService.java:65){code}

*Steps to Reproduce:*
# Start up JIRA from source in debug mode. 
# Start up Confluence, and create an application link between the two instances
# Set the Socket Timeout in General Configuration to, for example, 20000 (20 seconds)
# Create a project and issue in JIRA
# Set a breakpoint in JIRA anywhere that's convenient and hit the breakpoint
# Create a new page in Confluence and open up the network tab of your Browser
# Create a JIRA Issues Macro in Confluence and search for the new project. This will timeout

*Expected Results*
The macro times out after 20 seconds, as specified in Confluence's Socket Timeout.

*Actual Results*
The macro times out after 10 seconds, the default set in {{com.atlassian.sal.core.net.SystemPropertiesConnectionConfig}}

*Workaround:*

Add the following to your system properties in {{bin/setenv.sh}}:

{code}CATALINA_OPTS="$CATALINA_OPTS -Dhttp.socketTimeout=<YOUR_NEW_TIMEOUT_IN_MILLISECONDS>"{code} 
{code}CATALINA_OPTS="$CATALINA_OPTS -Dhttp.connection.timeout=<YOUR_NEW_TIMEOUT_IN_MILLISECONDS>"{code} 

For more information please see [Configuring System Properties|https://confluence.atlassian.com/display/DOC/Configuring+System+Properties].
fields.summary: The Socket Timeout in General Configuration doesn't override the SAL timeout

fields.description: FF --> after pasting, table is broken and editor is frozen, can not input more text inside editor. Users must refresh to re-start.

fields.description:
When you try to create a user in Confluence with an email address that contains unicode, it rejects it with "You must enter a valid email address." (see screenshot).

This is too restrictive - email addresses may free contain unicode in the local part as part of RFC 6531. Some mail servers may not permit it, but this becomes the responsibility of the mail server admin - Confluence should allow it.
fields.summary: Confluence doesn't allow unicode in email addresses

fields.description:
Seek does not work using the Multimedia macro.
I cannot skip around in the video, or rewind the video.  It just keeps jumping back to the spot in time it left off at.

Other issues with multimedia macro:
- Autoplay does not work, on Chrome, it just always starts autoplaying
- 100% or 50% of the screen also do not work on chrome.  
The video is always too small when % are used.  When using pixels, i can made the video bigger, but it will not adjust if another viewer is watching on a smaller screen size.
fields.summary: Seek does not work on mp4 video using multimedia macro (Chrome)

fields.description:

- Upload an add-on

Now every 2 seconds the background turned to white and after that again to dark gray again and again until the upload is completed.

Best regards
Sven
fields.summary: Background is flickering on uploading an add-on under "Manage Add-ons"

fields.description:
While the macro works with english language settings, it seems that the german translations provided for:

community.macro.following.my

community.macro.followers.my

are not evaluated correctly. Due to a "<" in the translation text, this leads to unexpected behaviour when using layouts inside a page.

See attached image.

Workaround used on our side:
1. Use Translation Plugin to change translation to "{0}", as a placeholder is needed.

2. Use the following CSS rule to hide the {0}:

.network-macro .description {
 display: none;
}
fields.summary: Network macro not working with german language settings

fields.description:
h3.Steps to Reproduce
# Create a delegated directory, hooked to Active Directory
# Login with an AD user, with the "Remember Me" option checked
# Close the browser completely
# Disable the user in AD (by checking the "Account is disabled" option in {{User Properties >> Account >> Account Options}} )
# Launch the browser again, and navigate to Confluence. Notice that you are still logged in as the disabled user. 
# The SUCCESSDATE in the logininfo table for this user is updated to the time when step #5 is executed

In a delegated directory, the user will only be locked out from Confluence once the user logs out, and log back in

In a connector directory, a directory sync will automatically lock the user out from Confluence
fields.summary: Disabling user in delegated Active Directory doesn't disable them in Confluence until they log in

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-36297].
  {panel}

During an issue creation it's very possible that instead of the {{Create}} button the {{Cancel}} one to be clicked upon. It would be much better to separate these two.

Some suggestions:
- either confirm the Cancel action by prompting the user
- realign the buttons in such a way that they aren't that close to each other and is not easily possible to cancel by mistake (for example when a touchpad on a Laptop is used, it's very easy to cancel by mistake)
fields.summary: Better prevention for canceling ticket creation by mistake

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-36296].
  {panel}

Hey,

I think it would be a really helpful improvement to save somehow the user's form (like the create issue form for eg.) and restore it back if some error occurs. Like for example:
I am on the wifi network 1 and complete a form with multiple fields and settings and then go to another place with my laptop and the laptop connects to another wifi network (I don't always get notified about that) through which the confluence/jira is not available and if I press submit/create/update I am getting an error and the data is gone.. that is terribly bad because I spent about 1h on writing that form and it would be a bit strange to do that in another text editor and paste it in attlassian just to overcome this :( also the bad thing is that the form might have other types of fileds than the texts ones..

Do you think there is a chance for me to have this?

Thank you very much!
fields.summary: Restore form data if an error happens

fields.description:
h4.Steps to Reproduce:
# Download the sample file
# Use a mac to login to Confluence. (Any browser)
# Attach the file to a page using drag and drop
# save the changes
# Login to Confluence using another machine, and OS
 
h4.Actual Results:
By navigating to the page that you have attached the file, you can see that the file names are incorrect
fields.summary: Attaching Korean file names using drag and drop on Mac will not display the correct filename when accessing Confluence on any other OS

fields.description:
Steps to reproduce:
- Go to a space and create a new blank page
- The editor will be opened and now enter title and content
- Click again on the Create button in the main menu (the editor is still open)
- A browser popup appears asking if you really want to leave the page - confirm it
- A new editor will be open 
- Confirm that you want resume editing the page
- If now you click on Close the editor you will be redirected to the editor before (just like a browser back) which works but clicking again on the close button it ends up with a "Oops - an error has occurred".

{code}
Stack Trace:[hide]
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Space key is required
	at org.springframework.util.Assert.isTrue(Assert.java:65)
	at com.atlassian.confluence.pages.DefaultDraftManager.create(DefaultDraftManager.java:245)
	at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke0(Native Method)
	at sun.reflect.NativeMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(NativeMethodAccessorImpl.java:57)
	at sun.reflect.DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.invoke(DelegatingMethodAccessorImpl.java:43)
	at java.lang.reflect.Method.invoke(Method.java:606)
{code}

I noticed the behavior on Confluence 5.7-beta8, 5.7-beta16 and 5.7 (release from yesterday).
On a previous version(5.6, 5.5, ...) the close directly redirects to the starting page before Create was clicked the first time.

From my prospective, it would make sense to disable Create if the editor is open and the user must decide to close or save the page if s/he wants to create a further new one.

Best regards
Sven
fields.summary: Error after creating a new blank page

fields.description:

Error rendering macro 'viewpdf' : The viewfile macro is unable to locate the attachment "한글.pdf" on this page
{code}
fields.summary: Attaching Korean file names in Safari using chrome results in "Error rendering macro"

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-36292].
  {panel}

It's currently really hard for a plugin developer to migrate attachments that had their IDs remapped due to the attachment to CEO work. We should add a method in a manager that lets you get the old and new attachment IDs so that the plugin devs can write their own upgrade tasks.

Calling the method will be done via a new method in the [compat lib|https://bitbucket.org/slancashire/confluence-attachment-to-ceo-compat/commits/56472132fc3f8e609022c83f7eccca475dcd90d9] that uses reflection to see if the method on the manager exists, or returns an empty result if it does not (nothing to migrate)

Unfortunately our plugin upgrade task infrastructure is not suitable for such an upgrade task - because if they want their plugin to be compatible with both pre 5.7 and 5.7+, and the upgrade task determines it has no work to do pre 5.7, it will never run again.

We could add something to the compatibility library that when registered as a component runs each time the plugin starts and the user implements an abstract method that does their migration and maybe another that provides a unique string that identifies their plugin. We then write some code to store the fact that the migration has been run.
fields.summary: Provide an easy way for plugin devs to migrate attachment IDs
HTML tags appear in excerpts using the page tree macro
Add Scroll Office plugin to the list of Atlassian Cloud Add ons
Source Code for Confluence-Basic-Macros
Show space name when linking to pages
When using the "Open Macro Browser" dropdown menu, the macro list isn't updated to match the filter.

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-36285].
  {panel}

Hey,

First of all - thank you for allowing users to open tickets in JIRA. This is awesome.

Secondly - I would like to suggest an auto-anchoring mechanism like google does. Usually, when anchoring, it's a sub-header within a specific document. We create those anchors in confluence to reference a sub-feature or a minor issue which can serve many people in the documentation.

I believe it would save a lot of time if you by default anchor any sub-header (all "h" hierarchy, 1 to inifinity).

Thanks!
fields.summary: Anchor all headers & sub-headers automatically

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-36284].
  {panel}

Hi,

I have both a Confluence and a Jira instance running and I can link Confluence pages into Jira tickets and vice versa etc, that's all neat and great.

However, I have a Knowledgebase space set up, with a header page that has basically just one big Search box and it works perfectly for any and all confluence content.

However, I wish it would also return results from my linked Jira instance, i.e. Jira issues if their summary or other details match my search terms.
This would make my Knowledgebase page the one-stop shop for all our information management.

Is that something that could be integrated? Or maybe it has been and I am too stupid to find/configure it.

Many thanks,
Patrick
fields.summary: Search should list content from linked Jira instance

fields.description:
When trying to edit the confluence product requirements blueprint to fit our needs, I found out that variables seem not to work as expected with this. 

How to reproduce:
1) go to some page space and find the section content tools
2) find the product requirements blueprint and click on edit
3) type $variableName
4) select 'list' as variable type and add some values
5) click on preview: the dropdown appears perfectly fine
6) click save
7) create a new product requirements page from the plueprint --> you'll find out that there is no dropdown visible

see also the attached screenshots.
I hope that helps to reproduce - if not please let me know what als you need asap.
fields.summary: Adding variables to blueprints not working
I cannot edit any confluence page

fields.description:
*Bug Description*

Confluence use two separate plugins to rendered and processed the "Like" button at the bottom of the page which is handle by "Confluence Like Plugin" and the "Like" button at the Workbox Notification mini view frame which is handled by Workbox plugin.

Issue occurred when "Confluence Like Plugin" is disabled as the "Like" button in the mini view frame stays while the one on the bottom of the page disappear.

*How to Replicate The Bug*

# Disable Confluence Like Plugin from "Manage Add-on" menu accessible from Confluence Administrator menu
# Mentioned a user in a comment section of a page
# Access Confluence using the said user
# Open the workbox notification
# Try to "Like" the comment
# "Forbidden" text will be thrown since "Confluence Like Plugin" is disabled as describe below

!forbidden.png|thumbnail!

*Possible Implementation*
Automatically Disabled "Like" button in Workbox Miniview When Like Plugin is Disabled.
fields.summary: "Like" Button in The Workbox Miniview Frame is not Deactivated when "Confluence Like Plugin" is Disabled

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-36279].
  {panel}

We use the RefinedWiki-Addon. A not logged in user only sees a small "Login"-Button in the upper right corner.
So, many people don't recognize that they are not logged in and wonder, why they can't find the needed information.
That's why we wonder, whether you could create an option to put a clearly visible Message on the screen to inform users that they are not logged in. This Message should disappear when they have logged in.
Thanks in advance
Hans
fields.summary: "Not-logged-in"-Message

fields.description:
In the page properties the character "<" is used. On the page property report the following error is displayed :

Error: The XML content could not be parsed. There is a problem at line 1, column 749. Parser message: Unexpected character ' ' (code 32) in content after '<' (malformed start element?). at [row,col {unknown-source}]: [1,749]
fields.summary: Page property report macro cannot display special character "<"

fields.description:
The full name and email address for a user in Confluence comes from the first enabled user directory with a user with that username. Other users with the matching username in other enabled user directories are shadowed. If two user directories are swapped, right now Confluence continues showing users in the people directory and mentions (and other user) autocomplete dialogs with the old full name, email and activation state. However, lookups that hit the database eventually find the correct full name, email and activation state.

To fix this, Confluence should reindex all users that are shadowed between these two directories, when the user directory order changes.

Similarly, Confluence should reindex all users when directories are enabled or disabled.
fields.summary: Reordering directories does not reindex affected users

fields.description:
To reproduce:
1. Edit a page that has some length to it
2. Click 'CTRL-F' and enter a search term that appears "beneath" the visibile edit window
3. Click 'Next'

Expected:
I will see the highlighted text that matches my search term

Actual:
I have to manually scroll down to find the highlighted text. I am left wondering if the text was found at all. For lengthy documents, this makes the search function almost unusable.
fields.summary: CTRL-F while in Edit mode finds text but browser does not take you to result
Feature to Export All Blog Posts

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-36273].
  {panel}

If the user creates a page according to [Product Requirements Blueprint|https://confluence.atlassian.com/display/DOC/Product+Requirements+Blueprint], then if the user highlight some text on the page he has the option to create an issue associated to the Epic informed on the page.

!Screen Shot 2015-01-26 at 6.33.23 PM.png!

!Screen Shot 2015-01-26 at 6.33.58 PM.png!

However, if he's on edit mode, highlight the text doesn't work.

!Screen Shot 2015-01-26 at 6.34.44 PM.png!

There's a macro avalable for creating issues, but the issues don't get  assoaciated to the epic.

!Screen Shot 2015-01-26 at 6.35.03 PM.png!
fields.summary: Create issue from a Product Requirement page while on edit mode

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-36271].
  {panel}

*Current Behaviour*
Administrator is not receiving a notification if he added or remove a user from the watch list of a page/space

*Feature Request*
Administrator should receive a notification if he added or remove a user from the watch list of a page/space
In addition to this, ability to send a notification to a user (watch the watchlist)  when a user is added or remove a user from the watch list of a page/space
fields.summary: Notification when a user is removed or added from the watch list
add default blueprint template for page properties report
Provide a notification for outdated pages and documentation

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-36265].
  {panel}

When you add users to group there should be a confirmation message that X users were added to the group. 

Too often you are adding multiple people to the group at once and of the 10 people you entered only 9 were added to the group, maybe you misspelt the other username or added a space in the wrong place or missed the comma, but the cruz of the issue is that there is no output message telling you only 9 of the 10 users were added. 

The only recourse is to manually check the list of users each time and check off the names you were adding. 

A simple message telling you who was added and who was not would be very beneficial.

Thanks,
Daniel
fields.summary: Adding users to a group should have a confirmation message
possibility of changing mentions in Page properties report in bulk

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-36262].
  {panel}

Since adding keyboard navigation / shortcut for Macro Browser (in CONF-15262) it lacks useful navigation paths in the browser itself for keyboard-only users!

# (/) default field / focus is search field 
#* (x) tab after search doesn't enter macro list
# (/) default tab after search field is category list 
# (x) category list can be navigated by up/down key
#* (x) tab after enter (select category) doesn't switch to the right macro selection
# (!) (x) tab / keyboard navigation in macro list is impossible
# (!) (x) tab select gets lost after some tabs (cancel, marketplace link in footer, next tab and it is lost)
fields.summary: Keyboard navigation in Macro browser needs improvements

fields.description:
Strange error that just started happening on the latest OD development driver within the last 3-7 days. I am not sure what else it impacts, but at least the SOAP render service returns incorrect data for content inside of some macros (like *noformat*) that looks like: {noformat} [{ xxxxxx }] {noformat} Removing any of the square or curly brackets works fine. The data returned is always the same no matter what is inside the brackets: *\[cltokxyzkdtnhgnsbdfcltok1\]* Here is a specific re-create using Confluence CLI. {code:none} java -jar /sde/atlassian-cli-4.0.0/lib/confluence-cli-4.0.0.jar --action render --space "ds" --title @home --content "{noformat} [{ xxxxx }] {noformat}" --clean --server https://bobswift-test.jira-dev.com/wiki --user automation --password "xxx" Rendered data 
 [cltokxyzkdtnhgnsbdfcltok1]
{code} I forgot to mention, this is a very often found text when dealing with JSON.
fields.summary: Render service returning [cltokxyzkdtnhgnsbdfcltok1]
Create Jira Issue Macro should include additional fields
Option to Hide Created by in a page

fields.description:
I'm using Firefox (v35.0) on Mac OS X Mavericks (v10.9.5).

When I go to the WYSIWYG editor in Confluence – to either create a page or add a comment, Cmd+K opens the "Insert Link" modal as expected.

The problem is that Ctrl+K also opens the same modal. On Mac systems, Ctrl+K is a reserved, system-wide UNIX command that is used to delete the text entry from the cursor to the end of the line. I use it very often.

There is no need to bind both Cmd+K and Ctrl+K to the same action.

On a similar note, Ctrl+A should position the cursor at the beginning of the line (and it works), while Ctrl+E should position the cursor at the end of the line (and it *doesn't* work).

This is a duplicate of the [original ticket|https://support.atlassian.com/servicedesk/customer/portal/14/CSP-138425] I've created on the Atlassian Service Desk.
fields.summary: Disable Ctrl+K to Add a Hyperlink in WYSIWYG Editor on Macs
"Share a Link" does not send notification and throws an exception

We have recently upgraded from 5.5.4 to the atlassian confluence 5.5.6 and having trouble with Page storePage(String token, Page  page) API.

{code}
com.atlassian.confluence.rpc.RemoteException: [com.ctc.wstx.exc.WstxLazyException] com.ctc.wstx.exc.WstxParsingException: Unrecognized XML directive; expected CDATA or comment ('<![CDATA[' or '<!--').

{code}

We did not have any issues publishing .htm files on confluence before upgrade. I have attached the files I'm trying publish. 

Any help would be greatly appreciated

Many Thanks,
Rahul Dalvi

If fields rest blanks i get error: "Unable to retrieve the application's certificate: Invalid response code of 407 returned from: http://192.168.*******:8081/admin/appTrustCertificate" 
page http://192.168.*******:8081/admin/appTrustCertificate shows some info.
But link in other side is OK!!!

• google

fields.description:
Similar to CONF-16709, but slightly different in that I do not want the option removed, just *clarified*. Since CONF-9830 is marked as Won't Fix, then we should not FTC by refusing to clarify what this option really does:
* It restricts public signup
* It prevents the Forgot Password link
* It removes the user's ability to reset their password in Confluence

Had spent days trying to determine how this happened in the Veterans Administration instance and could not reproduce. Will be writing a KB article to explain what this does, but ideally the product should be clear for simplicity's sake so that admins actually know what this does and not what it wrongly states that it does:  "Delegate user management to JIRA" which is NOT what this does.
fields.summary: Security Configuration > External User Management needs clarification
Option not to create recovery file during upgrade

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-36232].
  {panel}

For most cases (and even more since CONF-5587 when copying rich snippets from web) images from "external" sources should be able to be cached by Confluence to give us

* independent Confluence content that doesn't relies on a third party server
\\ no remote server needs to be queried each time the page is displayed
* disallows "remote" manipulation of that what you are willing to document
* will fix the "insecure content" issue if HTTP images are included in HTTPs wiki instance

For me:
# we should get a default caching for all external images
# there should be an option at the image to disallow caching for some certain cases (opt-out)
# we should get a whitelist for the administrator for image serving
fields.summary: Allow Caching external images

fields.description:
Few months back we installed  Confluence 5.6.1 and have been setting up and  testing the application to be rolled out through out the origination. However at times we have been encountering major performance issues time to time even though only 1 or two users have been using the tool. At times we also have been getting timeout errors while uploading attachments and creating pages.

Our IT support team had confirmed that the server hosting Confluence has no issues. Are you able to shed some light on this matter as we are trying to go live soon and this is seriously impacting this task.

I have attached herewith are the following log files for your reference:
1. atlassian-confluence
2. catalina.2015-01-21
3.Confluence 5.6.1 thread dump
4. Monitoring Console - Confluence

I have included the environment details in the Environment details fields.
fields.summary: Confluence has some serious performance issues at times

fields.description:
When you are using the documentation theme and then you click on a new page to view in the left navigation side bar, the left sidebar  automatically hides all of it's children pages. 

The expected behaviour in here is that the children pages are displayed once you click in the page you want to go.

h4. Steps to reproduce:
# Go to our [main documentation page|https://confluence.atlassian.com/display/ALLDOC/Atlassian+Documentation].
# Now expand "Contributing to the Atlassian Documentation"
!img1.PNG|thumbnail!
# Next Click on the "Atlassian Contributor License Agreement"
# What it was expected was that you would be redirected to the "Atlassian Contributor License Agreement" page and all the children pages would display in the left navigation bar like following image:
!img2.PNG|thumbnail!
# However when you click this is the result:
!img3.PNG|thumbnail!
fields.summary: Documentation theme left navigation side bar is not displaying the children page correctly

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa} *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-36228]. {panel} There are several places where the img tag for images is not properly closed, which breaks xhtml compatibility. This may not be dramatic for most browsers, but it is very critical for applications which render the content (of a macro or page) and then process it with XML tools. One example can be found in the demonstration space on the tutorial page (http://localhost:1990/confluence/display/ds/Tutorial for confluence 5.6.6) The source code of the page contains the following:



which is rendered by the XHTML renderer as:



Similar code is also produced in proiduction environments (e.g. https://developer.atlassian.com/display/CONFDEV/Confluence+Plugin+Guide). If you have any questions, feel free to contact me.
fields.summary: XHTML Renderer doesn't close img tag
Mixed content during editing macro
Enable Find for Jira issue macro text in edit mode

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This suggestion is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding suggestion|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-36212].
  {panel}

Hi,
I wrote a comment on a question on https://answers.atlassian.com and I added mysel as a watcher of this question.
As a result I'm getting every new questions on answers.atlassian.com per mail. 
I don't want that and I can't turn it off!
Please help!
Regards, Kai
fields.summary: I'm getting spammed by atlassian answers

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-36211].
  {panel}

h3. Summary

When importing a word document, Confluence prints the following warning in the logs and the import fails:
{noformat}2015-01-20 12:47:18,445 WARN [http-bio-6565-exec-5] [com.benryan.webwork.WordImportAction] executeFileUpload Failed to delete uploaded file /var/atlassian/application-data/confluence/confluence-5.6.5/temp/upload_ed4f3045_e77f_48b6_b76b_e99d30ca6b0d_00000001.tmp
 -- url: /pages/worddav/importword.action | page: 1802242 | userName: alex | referer: http://aconde01:6565/pages/worddav/uploadimport.action?pageId=1802242 | action: importword
{noformat}

h3. Steps to Reproduce
# Go to _Tools_ > _Import Word File_
# Select a file to upload and Click on next.
# The error message will appear in the logs, and an error might also generate in the UI. The following error was observed in a user's instance (even though there was no image in the instance that was this large):

The following error(s) occurred:
Could not import document. The document contains an image of size 6096000 x 2667000, which exceeds the maximum size of 900 x 1200. Reduce the size of the image or contact your administrator to raise the size limit.

h3. Expected Results

The import should be successful.

h3. Actual Results

The import fails and the tmp file is not removed per the logs.
 
h3.Workaround
One workaround found (with word documents including images) is to remove one of the images, attempt to upload the word doc (it should be successful), and then add the image back in once the page has been created.

This issue can also be caused by a corrupted file, try copying its contents to a new document, save and try uploading the new file instead.
fields.summary: Confluence try to delete temp file in Word Import

fields.description:
{panel:bgColor=#e7f4fa}
  *NOTE:* This bug report is for *Confluence Server*. Using *Confluence Cloud*? [See the corresponding bug report|http://jira.atlassian.com/browse/CONFCLOUD-36209].
  {panel}

In the latest Chrome (39), the cursor is not auto focusing to the editor after selecting header type. It can't be replicated in IE and Firefox

*Steps to replicate*
# Edit a page / Create a page
# Ensure that the cursor is in the editor
# Click on the Toolbar to Change the text format from "Paragraph" to "Heading 1"
# Immediately start typing

*Observed Behaviour*
- The keyboard input doesn't get through or delayed thus the text with Heading 1 format won't be written in the editor
- This behaviour can be replicated when changing Font Color or Additional Formatting (Subscript, Superscript, Monospace). It seems that the editor doesn't return the focus whenever Toolbar with the type of combobox/selector is used
fields.summary: Editor doesn't auto focus after Changing Header Type from Toolbar In the Latest Chrome

Your current location in Sidebar should be displayed better
